summary: An ordinance relating to, and specifying and adopting a plan or system of additions and betterments to, and extensions of, the existing municipal street railway system; providing for the acquisition of, and payment for, certain motorbusses; declaring the estimated cost thereof, as near as may be; providing for the issuance and sale of warrants to provide fund therefor; and creating and establishing a betterment fund and creating a special fund to pay the principal and interest of said warrants.
